entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 12:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: E 44 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Amount 5 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
